thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 21 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-SWM Posts Q4 Adjusted Earnings Per Share $0.64

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-SWM Posts Q4 Adjusted Earnings Per Share $0.64
text:
Feb 21 (Reuters) - Schweitzer-Mauduit International Inc :
* SWM ANNOUNCES FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 RESULTS * Q4 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.64 * Q4 GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.89 * SEES FY 2018 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $3.30 TO $3.45 * QTRLY TOTAL SALES INCREASED 19% TO $235.7 MILLION * SCHWEITZER-MAUDUIT - AS A RESULT OF TAX ACT, INCURRED DEEMED REPATRIATION TAX OF $1.59/SHARE, ON UNDISTRIBUTED EARNINGS OF SOME NON-U.S. UNITS
* SEES FY 2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE $2.73 TO $2.88 * COMPANY EXPECTS 2018 CAPITAL EXPENDITURES AND CAPITALIZED SOFTWARE SPENDING OF APPROXIMATELY $40 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
